hub_suffix.description: Hub tables must end with _h suffix

business_key_column.description: Hub tables must have a business key column ending with _bk

hash_key_column.description: Hub tables must have a hash key column ending with _hk

tenant_isolation.description: Hub tables must include tenant_hk for multi-tenant isolation

load_date_column.description: Hub tables must include load_date for temporal tracking

record_source_column.description: Hub tables must include record_source for data lineage
